segments.text: Excuse me . I seem to have lost my son .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy , madam . And speak slowly . May I have your name first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you describe his appearance to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is in a blue sportswear and a white sportsshoes . About 1.4 meters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I see . Dear Daniel , please come to the broadcasting station when you've heard this , your mother is waiting for you . If other tourists see a boy in a blue sportswear and a pair of white sportsshoes , 1.4 meters , please ask him to go to the broadcasting station . Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2
